30-minute action webinar ahead of the 2019 General Assembly.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We're gearing up for the 2019 Kentucky General Assembly and we want you to be part of our planning process. Register to join us on Thursday, November 8 for a 30-minute, online webinar on our legislative priorities and goals.

Passing the Pregnant Workers Act, holding the line on abortion access, and advancing smart criminal justice system reforms are at the top of our agenda. As always, we need you and all of our members, supporters, and allies to meet our goals to protect and expand our civil liberties.

In this webinar, the ACLU of Kentucky's Advocacy Director, Kate Miller, will discuss our legislative priorities, goals and areas where we will be playing defense in the 2019 General Assembly. We will also touch on the impact of the election as well as ways to get involved.

2019 Legislative Preview

Sign up for a 30-minute webinar to hear about our legislative goals in the 2019 General Assembly and how you can get involved.

Thursday, November 8, 7 p.m.
Online Webinar hosted on Zoom.

REGISTER

We want folks representing all corners of the Commonwealth on the webinar to take a look at our agenda and learn more about the ways you and your communities can take action well before our lawmakers start the session in early January. Please register today! We look forward to sharing with you soon.

ACLU of Kentucky
